channel.title: Authors on Dimitris Pantelaios
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Dimitris Pantelaios

item.description: I am Dimitris (Dimitrios) Pantelaios, a Electrical & Computer Engineering (ECE) graduate at National Technical University of Athens (NTUA). My research interests include Computer Vision, Medical Imaging and Artificial Intelligence. I was part of Dr. Kollias’ lab in the AI department and I currently aspire to be a PhD student, preparing and sending my applications to prestigious universities abroad. If you are looking for a PhD student at the aforementioned fields you can contact me at dimitris.pantelaios at gmail.com
